inputs: Add to the mixing bowl and coat well with 1 tbsp of olive oil & 1/2 tbsp of dried dill
In another bowl, add 2 tsp of vanilla extract, 3 tsp of baking soda and 1/2 tsp of salt
In a large bowl, combine confectioners' sugar, sour cream and vanilla
outputs: Add to the mixing bowl and coat well with 1 tbsp (15g) of olive oil & 1/2 tbsp (8g) of dried dill
In another bowl, add 2 tsp (10g) of vanilla extract, 3 tsp (15g) of baking soda and 1/2 tsp (3g) of salt
In a large bowl, combine confectioners' sugar, sour cream and vanilla
